How you can be part of Virtual Moon

We are building Virtual Moon for you. Not just to explore and enjoy the experience of being on the Moon, but to be an active participant in its creation and even own a piece of Virtual Moon yourself. We want to build a Virtual Moon community and want to offer every opportunity for you to be part of it and every opportunity to participate in the adventure of making it a reality. Maybe you just want to stay up to date on our progress and special events by providing your name and getting on our email list. Or maybe you wish to get more involved and contribute ideas and feedback. We would like you to consider donating to Virtual Moon. What better way to be part of the adventure than being able to say that you helped to build it? Your donation will help fund the continued development of the most unique immersive experience of the Moon. In return, and in appreciation of your support, Virtual Moon will reserve 100 square meters of Virtual Moon property for each dollar donated. You will become a true stakeholder. You will own a piece of Virtual Moon for as little as $1.

join Donate

Virtual Moon property

When Virtual Moon is completed and officially launches (currently scheduled for 3rd quarter of 2022) users will be able to purchase and own Virtual Moon property. At 1 cent per square meter, Virtual Moon property is amazingly affordable. A $1 investment will get you 100 square meters of property.

That’s a 10 meter by 10-meter square (about 33 feet by 33 feet). Once you have accumulated a large enough property, you will be able to develop it. You will be able to build your own structures, habitats, mining facilities, or anything else that you can imagine. We will post more details about this later on.

SPECIAL OFFER to our new Virtual Moon supporters: The Virtual Moon Visionary Initiative

We could go the traditional route and look to Venture Capital firms to provide the funding for the full-scale development of Virtual Moon. However, as already mentioned, we want to give our grassroots supporters every opportunity to participate in our success. We want you to be able to tell your friends that you helped to build Virtual Moon.

We have set aside an undisclosed number of square kilometers of Virtual Moon property to give away as a direct incentive and as a way of expressing our gratitude for your support.

For every $10 donation you send us, we will reserve one square kilometer of VM property in your name. Any amount you donate in multiples of $10 qualifies for the VMV promotion. If your donation is $40, for example, we will reserve 4 square kilometers. But you should hurry; once these limited parcels have all been given away, thee will be no more. When Virtual Moon is completed and opens to the public, your Ownership Options convert to actual property rights – You will own 1 square kilometer of Virtual Moon (1 million square meters) for each $10 donation.

read more

Become a Virtual Moon Founding Member

Anyone donating $1,000 or more automatically becomes a Virtual Moon Founding Member. Founding membership awards will be given to the first one thousand. In addition to receiving 100 square kilometers of reserved VM property, Founding Members will also be first in line when choosing where to stake their property claims, and will be immortalized by having their names featured on a “Wall of Fame” in the VM simulation, forever visible to visitors of Virtual Moon. Additional benefits for Founding Members will be announced in the near future.

MORE WAYS
TO PARTICIPATE:

Become a Virtual Moon Ambassador

As a Virtual Moon Ambassador, we are counting on you to help spread the message about Virtual Moon.

You can do that by telling your friends about us and using your social media network to promote Virtual Moon and broadcast VM announcements, promotions, and special offers.

Volunteer for a Project

This is another great way to contribute to the creation of Virtual Moon. We will soon begin posting information and descriptions for a number of projects. Once a project is activated, you can join the project team and offer your time, skills, knowledge and imagination. Detailed descriptions for all listed projects will be posted in the due course. Please check back regularly for project kick off announcements if you are interested in becoming part of a project team

The Selene Project:
The first large scale permanent city on the Moon
The Lunar Academy Project:
A fun place to learn about the Moon, space, and advanced tech
The Lunar Archeology Project:
The archeology and history of Lunar exploration

The goal of the Lunar Archeology Project is to develop the most complete list of all man-made objects to be found on the surface of the Moon and to place every object at the exact location where it is. When we say every object, we are talking not just about the objects that are currently intact such as the Apollo descent stages, all the instruments and tools left at the Apollo sites, the Surveyor landers, the Soviet and Chinese landers and rovers.

But also all the objects that crashed on the Lunar surface either on purpose or because of mission failure.

All such objects which can be identified will be replicated in VM and placed in their correct locations. Additionally, detailed information on each object will be accessible to VM users from within the VM simulation.

We need volunteers to do research and provide documentation that describes each object, its location on the Moon and important information related to that object. For science instruments, for example, VM will collect information on the design of the instruments, the physical principles on how it works, what data was collected and what we learned about the Moon from the data collected.

competition

Virtual Moon will run multiple competitions where you and your friends can showcase your creativity, your knowledge of the Moon, and your knowledge of the critical technologies needed to achieve Spacefaring Civilizations status. There will be cash awards as well as publicized recognition for the winning teams. Below is a list of planned competitions. Each one will be announced at the appropriate time, beginning this year. The particulars for each competition will be published as part of the competition announcement.

  • The Selene Design Challenge
  • The Selene Construction Challenge
  • Lunar Surface Transport Competition
  • The Lunar Rover Racing Competition
  • Lunar Dust Mitigation Systems Competition
  • Lunar Art Competition

Become a Virtual Moon Entrepreneur

We believe this may very well be the most exciting of all possible adventures on Virtual Moon.

Virtual Moon will be a Digital Twin of the Moon. An exact virtual replica rendered in fully immersive photorealistic detail and a fully simulated Lunar environment. It is being built as you read these words. It will be a permanent persistent environment that you can return to at any time. It has the exact same composition as the actual Moon in terms of the materials that can be found there and the same environmental properties (gravity, temperature profile, radiation, lunar dust, micrometeoroid impacts, etc). It requires that you overcome the same challenges of the Lunar environment. All the assets you need are at your disposal. The only limitations to contend with are the available technologies and the Laws of Physics.

We are giving millions of you the opportunity to become extremely wealthy Virtual Moon land owners (See the Virtual Moon Visionary Initiative).

The visionaries among you will immediately see the possibilities. We are looking for a million Virtual Elon Musks. In Virtual Moon, you can have all the capabilities and resources to which Elon Musk has access and use them to build your dreams on the Moon.

You have access to advanced technologies in robotics, Artificial Intelligence, materials, materials processing, manufacturing, and energy. But instead of having Mars as your goal, your objective is the Moon. You are singularly focused on building the first large scale permanent city on the Moon (Selene).

With all these resources available to you, how would you do it?

Is that a challenge you want to take on?
